name: Enhancing Product Descriptions using Generative AI
desc: Addressed the challenge of incomplete or inadequate product descriptions in e-Commerce by integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) and image-to-text technology.

name: NBA Fantasy Lineup Optimization
desc: A model to project player fantasy points using past performance metrics and use these projections to build lineups for daily fantasy competitions using LP optimization.

name: Analysing causal effect of Airbnb's superhost badge
desc: This study explores the impact of the 'Super host' badge on Airbnb occupancy rates in Chicago. The focus is on how the badge influences occupancy and how property managers can leverage it along with strategic pricing to enhance revenue. The study utilizes advanced statistical methods to uncover the effects of this badge and to guide marketing strategies for optimal pricing.

name: Automated system to flag derogatory content on Craiglist
desc: Developed a text analytics model to identify and flag derogatory, hate comments on the Craigslist platform

name: Identifying Fashion Trends by scrutinizing Gap INC's strategic decisions
desc: An academic project to scrape the e-commerce websites and use the extracted information to analyze the current fashion trends in the market.

name: Enhancing Backruptcy Prediction
desc: This project creates a predictive model that uses financial ratios and metrics to evaluate the likelihood of bankruptcy in firms.

name: Optimized solution for Delivery Operations
desc: This initiative seeks to improve STEM Store's delivery by implementing dynamic vendor allocation, reducing lead times by 40% and shipment costs by 15%. This strategy aims to enhance customer satisfaction and drive growth.
